articles.content: on Saturday reported a 10.7 per cent rise in consolidated net profit at Rs 409.48 crore for the quarter ended September 30, 2022. The non-banking finance company, which is mainly into gold loans, had… [+1006 chars]

articles.title: The big digital currency blowup: What's happened to crypto exchange FTX? - The Indian Express
articles.description: When the cryptocurrency market experienced a $2 trillion crash in May 2022, the crypto company FTX offered financial lifelines to several collapsing firms.
articles.content: Editors note: Since this article was published, FTX filed for bankruptcy on November 11, one of the biggest crypto blowups ever, after traders rushed to withdraw $6 billion from the platform in a cha… [+4633 chars]

articles.title: Did Firms Lose Billions Due To Fake Twitter Accounts With Blue Tick? Theories Fly - NDTV
articles.description: Amid Elon Musk's change overdrive, some Twitter users say "policy" tweets by impersonators led to share price fall for major companies; other argue "not everything is about Twitter"
articles.content: New Delhi: The flood of "verified" blue-tick accounts on Twitter earlier this week a fallout of Elon Musk's idea of making it available to anyone who pays $8 a month cost some companies "billions", a… [+3373 chars]
